author: parithosh
content:
keep an eye on this repo from SamüòÑ
https://github.com/samcm/checkpointz

The idea is for that to be a beacon node aware reverse proxy that allows just calls needed for checkpoint sync. Additionally you can configure caching to reduce the load on the node.

author: parithosh
content: that's a fair point. Our plan is to first get some tooling in place to run these nodes easily, then to make them visible and just act as a source of info. I guess we can talk about how to use that source of info once its up.
